This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

Лучшая игра для времяпровождения с другом. Не один час мы убили, чтобы пройти хитроумные головоломки ГлэдОС. И скажу, лишь, что купить эту игру обязательно стоит! Графика, на которую не стыдно смотреть даже в 2016 году, геймплей, который, уверен, порадует любого, и главное достоинство, как по мне, - сюжет. Это то, ради чего я до сих пор запускаю эту игру и прохожу несколько карт. А если вы уже прошли все интересные камеры испытаний от разработчиков, то что вам мешает зайти в Workshop, и подписаться на понравившиеся карты. Вы, также, можете предоставить свои камеры испытаний другим игрокам, что очень заинтересует творческих личностей.
В заключение хочу сказать, что Portal 2 обладает какой-то изюминкой и харизмой. Кейв Джонсон и Уитли вас развеселят!
Muito bom!

Stupendo

If you have even a passing interest in puzzle games you can't overlook Portal and its great succesor Portal 2. Great original concept, top notch execution, virtually unlimited gameplay through countless user submitted levels and several expansions that are almost a complete game in themselves. Add in actually entertaining humor and what you have is a game of legendary status. Even the gameplay is flexible enough to allow for a faster or a more relaxed approach, so it's suitable for all kinds of players. Highly recommended with absolutely no reservations.
Juegazo, simplemente muy bueno. Es un entretenido y divertido juego de puzles con una ambientación bastante única, y uno de los mejores villanos y más carismáticos que he visto en mi vida.
What are you doing here instead of playing this masterwork? Go!

Tengo que decir, portal 2 siempre fue y sera una obra maestra en tantas cosas; un clásico aorado por mucos, y con muy buenas razones, la narrativa, desarrollo de personajes, de niveles, la opcion de cooperativo, todo es hermoso. [♥]

An interesting take at the rather boring puzzle genre, with interesting characters to give you a good laugh while you solve some solid puzzles. One of the best co-op experiences you can find, and a huge amount of community-made maps also make this game a must-play. However, my one complaint, which really isn't much of a complaint, is that the game has very little replayability unless you're into speedrunning.

a while ago I decided to replay half-life and half-life 2.

I started by going for the new version of the first one, black mesa, which is incredible btw, and then rolled on to the end of half-life 2 episode 2. then I decided to finally give portal a try, and I couldn't believe how good that was.

2 hours later I was starting Portal 2, and went through it so fast I ended up with a huge headache.

you may have played at every type of game there is in this world, but that's why i'll say there's no way in HELL you can imagine what's awaiting you in this one. play it.

Portal 2 es un juego que reluce por su carisma y personalidad bien definida, con una buena historia que nos matendra entretenidos, un buen sentido del humor(de lo mejorcito que hay dentro de los videojuegos),unos graficos espectaculares, y una jugabilidad con unos puzzles con una buena curva de dificultad.
Pero no todo es perfecto Portal 2 es un juego demasiado corto, ademas de eso no trata de innovar frente a su precuela, no arriesgandose a utilizar mas aspectos nuevos, solo se utilizan algunos espacios abiertos que igualmente no dan el paso necesario para desarrollar lo que pudo llegar a ser un gran universo.
Por otro lado resaltar el guion utilizado a través del juego, con grandes monologos que nos dan a saber de la historia, y unos chistes que haran reir hasta al mas caradura.
Aunque el aspecto principal del juego no son sus personajes no hubiera estado mal adentrarse un poco mas en ellos, y ver que finalmente no todo era tan plano.
Finalemente criticar de una pequeña el multijugador que a final de cuantas no es tan divertido como el modo un solo jugador.
Apenas o melhor jogo de puzzle de todos!

jogo MUITO bom

Full disclosure: I hate Wheatley. The character is inexplicable, and the early hand-holdy "just follow this light" stuff is extremely frustrating. Would have been better with a better 'tutorial' or [spoiler] more explicit details on where exactly Wheatley came from - obviously he's not the same as the adventure sphere or the rage one from the first game, so did he start the same way Caroline did? [/spoiler]

However, minor issues with tiny plot points and a small portion of gameplay do not detract from what is, unquestionably, one of the best games I have ever played. There are so many secrets to discover throughout the game, and the mechanics and overall plot are excellent. It expands the mechanics and plot of the first game while still feeling like part of the universe.

I preo-ordered this game at full price and it's 100% worth it, so there's no excuse not to buy it at £3 in the sale.
